tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_project (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    manager_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Task (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(50),
    assigned_to INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (assigned_to) REFERENCES TeamMember(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    manager_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (manager_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending',
    deadline DATE,
    project_id INT,
    assigned_to INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (assigned_to) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE progress_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    update_description TEXT,
    update_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
  task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  task_description TEXT,
  deadline DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  assigned_to INTEGER REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);
